page.title: 11BURTON SALMON SCHOOL LIFE 1
page.content: I live at 7 Foxcliffe Brotherton. I wake up at 6.30 because my Mum goes to work at 7.25. Every morning I have cornflakes for my breakfast. I set off for school at 8.15 and arrive about 8.25. I go to the village shop and usually buy ice-pops. At 8.55 I go into the classroom and get on with some 9 a day work,it is like maths but it is easy. At about 9.30 we get on with Beta Maths. I am on Beta Book 4. When I come home from school I go to the shop and when I get home from the shop I watch television for an hour. I then go out to play with my friend James or go fishing with my cousin Steven. I go inside at 8.00 and go to bed at 10.00.
